content: Is there any IPS server support connectathon use case 1/2 (POST bundle) and 3 (POST composition and run $document)? @Rob Hausam

@Yunwei Wang I'm intending to verify the level of support that we do have currently for $document by the end of the week. We'll assess where we are and we may need to further progress it during the Connectathon. I'm also going to work on getting at least initial support for $summary on Patient in the HAPI server.
